== Description ==

Sets a post thumbnail.

== Usage ==

%%%<?php set_post_thumbnail( $post, $thumbnail_id ); ?>%%%

== Parameters ==

{{Parameter|$post|int/object|Post ID or object where thumbnail should be attached.|required}}
{{Parameter|$thumbnail_id|integer|Thumbnail to attach.|required}}

== Return Values ==

{{Return||int/bool|Post meta ID on success, false on failure.}}

== Change Log ==

* Since: [[Version 3.1|3.1]]

== Source File ==

<tt>set_post_thumbnail()</tt> is located in {{Trac|wp-includes/post.php}}.
